summary: A mod that lets you craft the three Aetherial unique items. The shield and crown are not enchanted (so you can put your own enchantment on them), I am unsure of what enchantment I should put on the staff, so I put magelight just for now.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD!

I wanted all three of the aetherial, but i didn\'t want to cheat. So I made this mod! Before anything you will need to make a Dwarven Gem at a smelter. This is the same as the Aetherium Crest, but obviously a completely separate item. You can not use it at the Aetherium forge.
Please leave a comment on what enchantment you would like the Dwarven Staff to have.

Recipes:

Dwarven Gem: 1x Dwarven Metal Ingot, 1x Grand Soul Gem (Empty)

Jeweled Dwarven Sheild: 1x Dwarven Gem, 4x Dwarven Metal Ingots, 2x Refined Malachite

Dwarven Crown: 1x Dwarven Gem, 2x Dwarven Metal Ingot, 2x Flawless Sapphire, 2x Gold Ingot

Dwarven Staff: 1x Dwarven Gem, 2xDwarven Metal Ingots, 2x Ebony Ingots, 1x Gold Ingot

(all recipes are the same as the Aetherium forge ones, but the Aetherium crest is replaced by the Dwarven gem)
author: SONNYSPAK
